verses.verse: Then the LORD <S%H3068><s%> answered <S%H6030><s%> Job <S%H347><s%> out of the whirlwind, <S%H5591><s%> and said, <S%H559><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> that darkens <S%H2821><s%> counsel <S%H6098><s%> by words <S%H4405><s%> without <S%H1097><s%> knowledge? <S%H1847><s%>
Gird <S%H247><s%> up now <S%H4994><s%> your loins <S%H2504><s%> like a man; <S%H1397><s%> for I will demand <S%H7592><s%> of you, and answer <S%H3045><s%> you me.
Where <S%H375><s%> were <S%H1961><s%> you when I laid the foundations <S%H3245><s%> of the earth? <S%H776><s%> declare, <S%H5046><s%> if you have understanding. <S%H998><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> has laid <S%H7760><s%> the measures <S%H4461><s%> thereof, if <S%H3588><s%> you know? <S%H3045><s%> or <S%H176><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has stretched <S%H5186><s%> the line <S%H6957><s%> on it?

Whereupon <S%H5921><s%> <S%H4100><s%> are the foundations <S%H134><s%> thereof fastened? <S%H2883><s%> or <S%H176><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> laid <S%H3384><s%> the corner <S%H6438><s%> stone <S%H68><s%> thereof;
When the morning <S%H1242><s%> stars <S%H3556><s%> sang <S%H7442><s%> together, <S%H3162><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> shouted <S%H7321><s%> for joy?
Or who shut <S%H5526><s%> up the sea <S%H3220><s%> with doors, <S%H1817><s%> when it broke <S%H1518><s%> forth, <S%H1518><s%> as if it had issued <S%H3318><s%> out of the womb? <S%H7358><s%>
When I made <S%H7760><s%> the cloud <S%H6051><s%> the garment <S%H3830><s%> thereof, and thick darkness <S%H6205><s%> a swaddling cloth <S%H2854><s%> for it,
And broke <S%H7665><s%> up for it my decreed <S%H2706><s%> place, and set <S%H7760><s%> bars <S%H1280><s%> and doors, <S%H1817><s%>

And said, <S%H559><s%> Till now <S%H5704><s%> <S%H6311><s%> shall you come, <S%H935><s%> but no <S%H3808><s%> further: <S%H3254><s%> and here <S%H6311><s%> shall your proud <S%H1347><s%> waves <S%H1530><s%> be stayed? <S%H7896><s%>
Have you commanded <S%H6680><s%> the morning <S%H1242><s%> since <S%H4480><s%> your days; <S%H3117><s%> and caused the dayspring <S%H7837><s%> to know <S%H3045><s%> his place; <S%H4725><s%>
That it might take <S%H270><s%> hold <S%H270><s%> of the ends <S%H3671><s%> of the earth, <S%H776><s%> that the wicked <S%H7563><s%> might be shaken <S%H5287><s%> out of it?
It is turned <S%H2015><s%> as clay <S%H2563><s%> to the seal; <S%H2368><s%> and they stand <S%H3320><s%> as a garment. <S%H3830><s%>
And from the wicked <S%H7563><s%> their light <S%H216><s%> is withheld, <S%H4513><s%> and the high <S%H7311><s%> arm <S%H2220><s%> shall be broken. <S%H7665><s%>
Have you entered <S%H935><s%> into <S%H5704><s%> the springs <S%H5033><s%> of the sea? <S%H3220><s%> or have you walked <S%H1980><s%> in the search <S%H2714><s%> of the depth? <S%H8415><s%>
Have the gates <S%H8179><s%> of death <S%H4194><s%> been opened <S%H1540><s%> to you? or have you seen <S%H7200><s%> the doors <S%H8179><s%> of the shadow <S%H6757><s%> of death? <S%H6757><s%>
Have you perceived <S%H995><s%> the breadth <S%H7338><s%> of the earth? <S%H776><s%> declare <S%H5046><s%> if <S%H518><s%> you know <S%H3045><s%> it all. <S%H3605><s%>
Where <S%H335><s%> is the way <S%H1870><s%> where <S%H335><s%> light <S%H216><s%> dwells? <S%H7931><s%> and as for darkness, <S%H2822><s%> where <S%H335><s%> is the place <S%H4725><s%> thereof,
That you should take <S%H3947><s%> it to the bound <S%H1366><s%> thereof, and that you should know <S%H995><s%> the paths <S%H5410><s%> to the house <S%H1004><s%> thereof?
Know <S%H3045><s%> you it, because <S%H3588><s%> you were then <S%H227><s%> born? <S%H3205><s%> or because the number <S%H4557><s%> of your days <S%H3117><s%> is great? <S%H7227><s%>
Have you entered <S%H935><s%> into <S%H413><s%> the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the snow? <S%H7950><s%> or have you seen <S%H7200><s%> the treasures <S%H214><s%> of the hail, <S%H1259><s%>
Which <S%H834><s%> I have reserved <S%H2820><s%> against the time <S%H6256><s%> of trouble, <S%H6862><s%> against the day <S%H3117><s%> of battle <S%H7128><s%> and war? <S%H4421><s%>
By what <S%H335><s%> <S%H2088><s%> way <S%H1870><s%> is the light <S%H216><s%> parted, <S%H2505><s%> which scatters <S%H6327><s%> the east <S%H6921><s%> wind on the earth? <S%H776><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> has divided <S%H6385><s%> a watercourse <S%H8585><s%> for the overflowing <S%H7858><s%> of waters, or a way <S%H1870><s%> for the lightning <S%H2385><s%> of thunder; <S%H6963><s%>

To cause it to rain <S%H4305><s%> on <S%H5921><s%> the earth, <S%H776><s%> where no <S%H3808><s%> man <S%H376><s%> is; on the wilderness, <S%H4057><s%> wherein there is no <S%H3808><s%> man; <S%H120><s%>
To satisfy <S%H7646><s%> the desolate <S%H7722><s%> and waste <S%H4875><s%> ground; and to cause the bud <S%H4161><s%> of the tender herb <S%H1877><s%> to spring <S%H6779><s%> forth? <S%H6779><s%>
Has <S%H3426><s%> the rain <S%H4306><s%> a father? <S%H1><s%> or <S%H176><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has begotten <S%H3205><s%> the drops <S%H96><s%> of dew? <S%H2919><s%>

Out of whose <S%H4310><s%> womb <S%H990><s%> came <S%H3318><s%> the ice? <S%H7140><s%> and the hoary <S%H3713><s%> frost <S%H3713><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has gendered <S%H3205><s%> it?
The waters <S%H4325><s%> are hid <S%H2244><s%> as with a stone, <S%H68><s%> and the face <S%H6440><s%> of the deep <S%H8415><s%> is frozen. <S%H3920><s%>
Can you bind <S%H7194><s%> the sweet <S%H4575><s%> influences <S%H4575><s%> of Pleiades, <S%H3598><s%> or <S%H176><s%> loose <S%H6605><s%> the bands <S%H4189><s%> of Orion? <S%H3685><s%>
Can you bring <S%H3318><s%> forth <S%H3318><s%> Mazzaroth <S%H4216><s%> in his season? <S%H6256><s%> or can you guide <S%H5148><s%> Arcturus <S%H5906><s%> with his sons? <S%H1121><s%>
Know <S%H3045><s%> you the ordinances <S%H2708><s%> of heaven? <S%H8064><s%> can you set <S%H7760><s%> the dominion <S%H4896><s%> thereof in the earth? <S%H776><s%>
Can you lift <S%H7311><s%> up your voice <S%H6963><s%> to the clouds, <S%H5645><s%> that abundance <S%H8229><s%> of waters <S%H4325><s%> may cover <S%H3680><s%> you?
Can you send <S%H7971><s%> lightning, <S%H1300><s%> that they may go <S%H3212><s%>and say <S%H559><s%> to you, Here <S%H2009><s%> we are?

Who <S%H4310><s%> has put <S%H7896><s%> wisdom <S%H2451><s%> in the inward <S%H2910><s%> parts? or <S%H176><s%> who <S%H4310><s%> has given <S%H5414><s%> understanding <S%H998><s%> to the heart? <S%H7907><s%>
Who <S%H4310><s%> can number <S%H5608><s%> the clouds <S%H7834><s%> in wisdom? <S%H2451><s%> or who <S%H4310><s%> can stay <S%H7901><s%> the bottles <S%H5035><s%> of heaven, <S%H8064><s%>
When the dust <S%H6083><s%> grows <S%H3332><s%> into hardness, <S%H4165><s%> and the clods <S%H7263><s%> stuck <S%H1692><s%> fast together?
Will you hunt <S%H6679><s%> the prey <S%H2964><s%> for the lion? <S%H3833><s%> or fill <S%H4390><s%> the appetite <S%H2416><s%> of the young <S%H3715><s%> lions, <S%H3715><s%>
When <S%H3588><s%> they couch <S%H7817><s%> in their dens, <S%H4585><s%> and abide <S%H3427><s%> in the covert <S%H5521><s%> to lie in wait? <S%H695><s%>

Who <S%H4310><s%> provides <S%H3559><s%> for the raven <S%H6158><s%> his food? <S%H6718><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> his young <S%H3206><s%> ones cry <S%H7768><s%> to God, <S%H410><s%> they wander <S%H8582><s%> for lack <S%H1097><s%> of meat. <S%H400><s%>
